title: Miss Lily's
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Bakery, Caribbean, Jamaican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A casual Caribbean outpost specializing in a modern approach to classic island cooking. Restaurant, cafe, juice bar, bake shop and record store. Offers vegan dishes and a wide range of juices. Really relaxed cafe/bar atmosphere with a slightly more formal restaurant area open for dinner.
